duties_responsibilities.duty: Transfer a high throughput DNA processing assay for a Laboratory Developed Test
Develop operational and maintenance procedures for a high-throughput laboratory
Analyze data from multiple sources for balancing operator efficiency, cost of goods, and system uptime
Write and maintain user manuals, SOP’s, and work instructions
Transfer processes and equipment from Research and Development into Laboratory and Operations teams
Support troubleshooting efforts during integration testing
Occasional off-shift or weekend coverage to support the technical team

education_certification.credential: BS (MS preferred) in an Engineering or Life Sciences Field
